H0.text: Which 'literary' nickname has been given to the extinct species of man, discovered in Indonesia 2003, named Homo Floresiensis. Hobbit

H1.text: Which 'literary' nickname has been given to the extinct species of man, discovered in Indonesia 2003, named Homo Floresiensis. Islander

H2.text: Which 'literary' nickname has been given to the extinct species of man, discovered in Indonesia 2003, named Homo Floresiensis. Lilliputian

H3.text: Which 'literary' nickname has been given to the extinct species of man, discovered in Indonesia 2003, named Homo Floresiensis. Stoor

A4.text: Homo floresiensis was swiftly nicknamed 'the hobbit' by the discoverers
